verses.name: Psalms 49:12
verses.text: Nevertheless man being in honour abideth not: he is like the beasts that perish.

verses.name: Psalms 49:13
verses.text: This their way is their folly: yet their posterity approve their sayings. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 49:14
verses.text: Like sheep they are laid in the grave; death shall feed on them; and the upright shall have dominion over them in the morning; and their beauty shall consume in the grave from their dwelling.

verses.name: Psalms 49:15
verses.text: But God will redeem my soul from the power of the grave: for he shall receive me. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 49:16
verses.text: Be not thou afraid when one is made rich, when the glory of his house is increased;
